Cincinnati.Cedric G. and Patricia Neils Boulter Hou:
Cedric G. Boulter and Patricia Neils House is a registered historic building in Cincinnati, Ohio, USA, listed in the National Register on May 14, 1999.
In 1949, Patricia’s parents commissioned the Frieda and Henry J. Neils House in Minnesota and Wright promised to design a home for her when she married.
